string.value: #p2040052# of #m222020000# has prepared some storybooks for #p2101008#. No idea when the queen may act up again, so you should hurry back to to #b#m260000000##k and give them to #b#p2101008##k.
After receiving the book, #p2101008# let out a sigh of relief. Hopefully these books will be enough for her for a while... Poor #p2101008#, when will she be freed from the wrath of the queen?
Okay, this is a book that contains desert stories and other stories from afar that #p2101008# may not be aware of. It has a lot of stories in it, so she should be fine for a while. Please take it.

It's amazing to see a woman in such a stressful environment who nevertheless constantly searches for great stories... It really is. Once you go back to #b#m260000000##k, tell #b#p2101008##k I'd most like to meet her here at #m222020000# when she gets free of the queen.
You don't plan on returning to #m260000000#? #p2101008# seemed pretty desperate...
Welcome, traveler... Did you really go to #m222020000# and back? Ah, so this is the book from #p2040052#... Thank you very much. With this, I'll have enough stories to last a while.

I can't help but envy you for being able to travel to far places like #m220000000# and even #m222020000#... I wonder when I'll be free of the queen's grasp... I dream of the day I can travel the world with my brother.
If you go to #b#m260000000##k, please tell #b#p2101008##k to one day come to this library and personally return the book....
Have you not gone to #m222020000# yet? It's not close to here, so you should get moving.
You dropped the book that you were supposed to give to #p2101008#. Fortunately, all books from #m222020000# are magically locked, so if any of them get lost, they return to the library.
